radiographic_examinations.findings: The appendix is dilated to 14 mm and is fluid filled and demonstrates a hyperemic thickened wall. The sigmoid colon and rectum are normal. The distal ureters and bladder are normal. There is no pelvic or inguinal lymphadenopathy. There is no free fluid in the pelvis. There is severe levoscoliosis in the lumbar spine, with left lateral listhesis of L4 over L5. The right hemipelvis and right proximal femur demonstrate abnormal morphology, increased generalized sclerosis, and multiple scatter lucent lesions. No acute fracture is seen.
